abstract: AT&T plans to introduce a nationwide program Monday that gives owners of small- and medium-size businesses some of the same tools big security companies offer for monitoring employees.
snippet: AT&T plans to introduce a nationwide program Monday that gives owners of small- and medium-size businesses some of the same tools big security companies offer for monitoring employees.
lead_paragraph: AT&T plans to introduce a nationwide program today that gives owners of small- and medium-size businesses some of the same tools big security companies offer for monitoring employees, customers and operations from remote locations.

headline.main: AT&T to Sell Equipment to Monitor Workplaces
headline.print_headline: AT&T to Sell Equipment To Monitor Workplaces

abstract: Rebounding after three days of declines, shares of Apple climbed after China Mobile, the world’s biggest wireless operator, said it was in talks to sell the iPhone.
snippet: Rebounding after three days of declines, shares of Apple climbed after China Mobile, the world’s biggest wireless operator, said it was in talks to sell the iPhone.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s shares rose more than they had in over a year after China Mobile, the world’s biggest wireless operator, said it was in talks to sell the iPhone.

headline.main: Apple Shares Soar on Chinese Interest in iPhone
headline.print_headline: Apple Shares Soar on Chinese Interest in iPhone
